title: Client stuck at role selection screen caused me to dodge a provisional game
body:
https://youtu.be/kmh3_2WGWM0

THe video shows me stuck at role selection but still has all the sounds and actions of the champion select. I can click and hear pictures and champions being selected but all i'm seeing is the role selection screen. This when it was my turn to ban i was aunable to do anything. It then caused a dodge. Also afterwards i couldn't close the client until i went to task manager to end task. Is there anyway to help me with this to get my provisional game back? It doesn't seem right that I lose a game that can affect my placement because of this glitch or bug.

replies.body:
Thanks for the clip!  Have you tried relogging in case you somehow lost sync with the updated client?  If the issue persists after, what happens if you return to the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

We can't adjust game stats, but you may want to do your placement games on the legacy until resolved and test out the client while doing normals.  Hope that helps!

Just to add on since I was seeing it asked in other posts and even though its on the video I'm on the update client. The Open beta is where this occurred. But seriously is there anyway to help with this. It don't seem right that I had to dodge because of this and if i remember correctly when you dodge during provision it either counts as a loss or you don't get to play the 10 games so it basically counts as a loss.
